mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Eliza Parke Custis Law to Mrs. Gideon Snow, 1828 October 18
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Law, Elizabeth Parke Custis, 1776-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eliza presents her friend the attached clipping of two words ["that it"] cut from something written by George Washington -- she also attached a small piece of velvet worn by him -- all in thanks for Snow's kindnesses since Eliza's arrival in Boston. Name on original manuscript appears as "Eliza Parke Custis." Autograph document signed, 2 pages, laminated.
